body_html: Yes. Telling users to write a python script to visualize a saved model graph is a very bad user experience [it's not even documented as a thing that can be done], and seems like something tensorboard should be very good at.
body_text: Yes. Telling users to write a python script to visualize a saved model graph is a very bad user experience [it's not even documented as a thing that can be done], and seems like something tensorboard should be very good at.
